data.name: Tray Racers!
data.detailed_description:
âœ¨The world endedâ€¦But the fun didnâ€™t!âœ¨

From the creators of PHOGS!, Tray Racers! is a free-to-play racing game set in a vibrant post-apocalyptic world. Armed with nothing but your trusty tray, you play as a ragtag kid speedster - race solo or with up to 16 players through a wacky playground of randomly-generated sand dunes, cute critters, bouncy cactus forests and more!

Surf the sizzling sands. Dazzle your pals with tray tricks. Hitch a ride on a giant worm. And outspeed your friends to becomeâ€¦the ultimate Tray Racer!

For gamers of all ages! ðŸ’›



ðŸŒµ Hold onto your butts! Itâ€™s time to raceâ€¦ ðŸŒµ

Surf the dunes on your very own tray
Race solo or in online multiplayer (with up to 16 players!!)
Embrace your inner daredevil with *bonus speed* for near misses
Goof off with silly emotes
Pull off âœ¨cool âœ¨ tray tricks & combos
Perfect for parties with pals ðŸ’›





ðŸŒµDiscover a dazzling desert-world ðŸŒµ

When the world ended, the people of Tray Racers! found a better, more sustainable way to live. Together, and in better harmony with nature ðŸŒ±

Every race takes place on a unique, randomly-generated track - with weird and wonderful vistas, hazards, creatures, and surprises from a mix of bizarre & beautiful post-apocalyptic biomes. Featuring:

Bouncy cactus forests
Wacky wastelands
Cute bugs & other critters
Mysterious buried cities (oooOOOooooh!)
Sustainable solarpunk settlements
Herds of GIANT Camellos
& More!



ðŸŽ¨ Race in style! Give your racer a makeover withâ€¦ðŸŽ¨

Sick Threads
Gnarly Hairstyles
Custom tray paint-jobs
& More!





ðŸ˜ŠGet cute and cozy at the Camp ðŸ˜Š

Hang out with friends between races at the chilled-out Camp lobby
Host a jam sesh with the Campâ€™s musical instruments
Ponder your place in the universe under a starry nightâ€™s sky
Pet *everything* with a dedicated â€˜pet-the-thingâ€™ button
(Thereâ€™s a friendly creature in the Camp called Scrump and we love himâ€¦)



ðŸŒ± Wholesome vibes ðŸŒ±

Made with ðŸ’› by an indie team
A positive take on the apocalypse that celebrates all things eco, kindness & community
No way to hinder other players while racing (winning isnâ€™t everything!)
Characters that make you go awwwwwwww

data.short_description: The world endedâ€¦But the fun didnâ€™t! Race solo, or with your pals across the adorable post-apocalyptic world of Tray Racers! Grab a tray, surf the dunes, and get ready to SLIDE, DRIFT and TRICK your way to the finish line in this cute and colorful party racer, built for online multiplayer! YAHOOOOOO!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
